channel.title: String args method need help please. (pi)

item.title: String args method need help please. (pi)
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

basically i am trying to split the command into two parts, the first word entered after the command, and the rest of the text (multiple words) and save it to a file.

String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
String reported = args[1];
String reason = args[2];

how can i make it so that if the args are greater or equal to 2 it will include all the args after the first one (variable reported)
i have tried:

didnt work :eek:
i even tried:

if (args.length == 2) { String reason = args[2]; } if (args.length == 3) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3]; } if (args.length == 4) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4]; } if (args.length == 5) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4] + (" ") +args[5]; } if (args.length == 6) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4] + (" ") +args[5] + (" ") +args[6]; } if (args.length == 7) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4] + (" ") +args[5] + (" ") +args[6] + (" ") +args[7]; } if (args.length == 8) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4] + (" ") +args[5] + (" ") +args[6] + (" ") +args[7] + (" ") +args[8]; } if (args.length == 9) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4] + (" ") +args[5] + (" ") +args[6] + (" ") +args[7] + (" ") +args[8] + (" ") +args[9]; } if (args.length == 10) { String reason = args[2] + (" ") +args[3] + (" ") +args[4] + (" ") +args[5] + (" ") +args[6] + (" ") +args[7] + (" ") +args[8] + (" ") +args[9] + (" ") +args[10];
